works.name: Antib0dy Club
works.desc: Created an infinite light tunnel for Antib0dy Club, a web-based open world video chatting platform centered around artistry, live performance, and inclusion. Developed shaders for webcam avatar displays, custom rooms, and other assets with OpenGL and three.js. Other responsibilities include programming and animating interactive splash pages.
label: Antib0dy Club

works.name: dolphinuppercut.com
works.desc: Created an artist link site for Dolphin's media and platforms. Made with React-three-fiber.
label: dolphinuppercut.com

works.name: Aerobanquets by Mattia Casalegno
label: aerobanquets
NYTimes
Washington Post
Bloomberg
Mattia Casalegno
Rahi
James Beard Foundation
works.desc: Served as the main developer for a mixed-reality immersive gastronomy dining experience by Mattia Casalegno at the James Beard House. Worked on programing interactions, handtracking, shaders, locally networked virtual reality, and haptic UI/UX interfaces for staff. Previously exhibited at Soho House in NYC, ISEA 2019's FoodHack ACT Festival in Gwangju South Korea, and at the Chronus Art Center in Shanghai.

works.name: Portraits in Landscape by Carla Gannis
works.desc: Sound development for 3-channel video artwork Portraits in Landscape by Carla Gannis. Used also in the documentation and promotions for a silent iteration at Times Square's Midnight Moment. Exhibited at Governors Island NYC through Harvestworks as well as the Carl & Marilynn Thoma Art Foundation in Santa Fe with TRANSFER.
label: Times Square Midnight Moment
Harvestworks
Carla Gannis

works.name: Sum'n Lyte 3 by ADRIIIAN
works.desc: Created a series of audio-reactive visual promotions for upcoming album Sum'n Lyte 3, by ADRIIIAN.
label: vimeo
ADRIIIAN

works.name: Temporary Forever
works.desc: A binaural study of sound through the lens of virtual object-oriented ontology. Worlds dynamically created and driven by external noises. Rendered with real-time raytracing.
label: vimeo

works.name: 3D Modeling
works.desc: Various 3D Projects exploring form and texture

works.name: Entropy
works.desc: A 3D video synthesizer that uses gravity fields to recycle. System controlled by live audio input and MIDI interface.
label: vimeo

works.desc: An audio-visual composition that contorts immaterial and sound. Sequenced in real-time with a drum machine.

works.desc: A 9 person 27-screen collaborative video work exhibited for CYFEST 11 at The Made in NY Media Center in Dumbo, Brooklyn.

works.name: livecode.nyc
works.desc: Performed as an audio-visual duo with Sean Lee. Programmed various real-time video systems to control with MIDI interfaces and sequencers. Performances at Eyebeam, Performance Space 122 with Babycastles, and Secret Project Robot.
